title: How League was probably set up by God in the past.....

replies.body:
Pink salt. 

Huh.
Maybe it's the blood from Danganronpa.
its sad that some people wont get that joke
And the joke being wacky japanese censorship laws?
a say what now?
I don't know what this Danganropa is. But it sounds disappointing.
don't remind me pls. The only thing that comes to mind is mondo butter
When the Armour of the Fifth Age {{champion:44}} support is salty.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=dWxGLn7u,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-07T18:10:35.229+0000)
>
> Pink salt. 
> 
> Huh.

Pink salt exists. Its himalayan
Almost looks like he added a taste of purple there.
this is inappropriate. ሪፖርት ተደርጓል.
How so

Inappropriate Discussions

Moderators will be looking for topics discussing:
Religion
Sex
Politics
Any social issues, though some exceptions may be appropriate (e.g., internet legislation)

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules
It isn't discussing religion, it's just for the sake of a nonserious meme. Discussing religion means a religious debate between multiple people.
"How league was probably set up by god in the past" that title is bringing some serious heat against your argument.

And technically it still isn't a discussion from my understanding. If OP mentioned "God doesn't exist" etc. it would be provocative and would start a true debate, but this isn't serious. Have you seen the countless Trump jokes on this board before? As far as I know none of those got removed because they weren't serious discussions, or discussions at all.

i dont really think its fair that this person can post this but i cant even end or start my sentences with "dear/thank allah" and yet here his post is with a title like that, and nothing happens to him. injustice i say.

It shouldn't even be offensive, but some religions are simply way more serious about the way their deities are portrayed by others. I don't want to bring this debate further, this is what I was talking about.
well that is why i say that its an inappropriate post. as long as its up i will report it.
Why, aren't you a tad sensitive.

why can't you? as long as you're not talking about a religion in the sentence and you're just tacking it to the end. 


an agnostic's advice: just put your deity's name where ever you see someone else's. the point will come across that way.
Oh ok. Thought you were just being hypersensitive.
sarcasm... right?
God was a food hipster who buys Himalayan pink rock salt? Who knew.
The salt is pink so the old people can see it
oh this is still up? seriously gonna have to report it again.
